subject: Phase 2-C: Create backend/services/collector.py
description:
Create new file backend/services/collector.py with:
- search_images(queries, search_api, max_results) → Execute image search
- _search_google_cse(query, max_results) → Google CSE API call (uses GOOGLE_CSE_API_KEY, GOOGLE_CSE_ID from config)
- _search_gemini_deep(query, max_results) → Gemini Deep Search fallback (grounding with Google Search)
- download_candidate(source_url, timeout=30) → Download single image
- download_candidates_batch(candidate_ids, job_id) → Batch download for BackgroundTasks

Google CSE: GET https://www.googleapis.com/customsearch/v1?key=...&cx=...&q=...&searchType=image
Gemini Deep Search: Use genai.Client with google_search tool for grounding
Download: httpx async client, save to COLLECTION_DIR from config.
Database access: get_connection() try/finally for updating candidate status.
